text: You can tell mosquitos apart under a microscope
Or you can just listen to the beat of their wings
Different species make a different sound --
and it’s easy to capture even with a flip phone
Now, mosquito spotters can upload their "songs" to a website
that will identify and map the humming pests
With an easy way to find different types of mosquitoes --
public health officials will be able to track
Or just compose music with a nice buzz to it
